characters.name: Unicorn
characters.description: A mystical unicorn with a slender, graceful body. It has a shimmering white coat, a long spiraled horn of silvery color, and a flowing mane and tail with a rainbow gradient. Its eyes are large and blue, and its hooves are made of golden sheen.

scenes.background_description: In the tranquil heart of an enchanted forest, a gentle twilight casts a serene glow. Majestic trees with cascading vines frame the scene, while ethereal blue mist swirls gently around. The atmosphere buzzes with quiet magic, crafted in a storybook illustration style with soft pastel shades and intricate details.
scenes.narration_text: As the sun dips below the horizon, a unicorn softly treads along the moss-covered path through the mystical forest.

scenes.background_description: A mysterious meadow opens up, bathed in the soft glow of moonlight, dotted with luminescent flowers. The night sky above sparkles with countless stars, casting a silvery light over everything. This dreamlike scene is illustrated with gentle brushstrokes and a whimsical color palette.
scenes.narration_text: The unicorn emerges from the forest into a meadow, its hooves barely brushing the earth as it moves gracefully under the night sky.
